body_html:
so somewhere in the code, I have:

os.environ['CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES'] = gpu_id
previously with 0.1.12, to run parallel jobs I passed one GPU ID to each job, and this worked fine.
However, after upgrading to 0.2.0 without changing code, all parallel jobs are on GPU 0, no matter which GPU ID i was trying to assign each job to.

I didn't check if the final results are correct, but this GPU behavior is not what I wanted.
Any clue what was going on?
